titleInfo.title: United Jewish Appeal Prime Minister's Mission

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Typed on paper taped to the back of the photograph: ''Return to: P R Department, Allied Jewish Fed., 300 S. Dahlia St., Denver, CO 80222; Norm Brownstein, Rick Bugdanowitz and Larry Mizel members of the Denver contingent of the Prime Minister's Mission; at the private home of Minister of Foreign Affairs Moshe Dayan. The Minister had invited the 300 participants of the UJA 1980 Prime Minister's Mission for a briefing on Israel's current Foreign Affairs posture.''

mods.abstract: Left to right Norm Brownstein, Rick Bugdanowitz, and Larry Mizel sit outside the private home of Minister of Foreign Affairs Moshe Dayan during a foreign affairs briefing during a United Jewish Appeal Denver Prime Minister's Mission to Israel.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
